Notes: Tayda: It's very easy to cut this to size, and if needed, spare length can be used to mount the teensy to the board.
Tayda: It's very easy to cut this to size, but using a single 1x2 section for J2 can get tricky.
Any capacitor > ~25V and 33 uF will work
Mouser: Green and Blue channels MIGHT be switched.
A teensy can be found elsewhere other than mouser for cheaper.
Potentiometers are cheaper/higher quality from tayda. If you want a different shaft style for whichever knobs you're using, those are available as well.
Mouser: Other jacks may fit, these definitely will.
